Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute near Pershing/LaSalle
ShortDescription: 39 buses temp. rerouted WB: Pershing, State, 35th, LaSalle, and Pershing; EB: Pershing, Wentworth, 43rd, State, and Pershing near Pershing/LaSalle.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Pershing/LaSalle due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via Pershing, State, 35th, LaSalle, and Pershing.

Eastbound buses will operate via Pershing, Wentworth, 43rd, State, and Pershingac.

Allow extra travel time.
